note.p: Death: Budleigh Salterton, Devon (12 or 17 November 1867)
Career: Took up chemistry; Chemist in the brewery of Truman, Hanbury and Buxton (1831-1839); Chemical Operator, Society of Apothecaries (1842-1867); active in the foundation of the Chemical Society
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1867-1868 vol 16 pp xlix-l
Notes: Proc. RS and Boase both give date of death as 12 November 1867
